name: places/ChIJoRtMHZ5ZwokR4ni8-QUCNGs
adrFormatAddress: 227 1st Ave., New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: This store has the best prices for beer in Manhattan! The employees here are awesome and can help you with whatever you are looking for. They have a large selection of beer cigars and smoking material. Very clean and my new favorite store!

text.text: This store has the best prices for beer in Manhattan! The employees here are awesome and can help you with whatever you are looking for. They have a large selection of beer cigars and smoking material. Very clean and my new favorite store!

originalText.text: Great service, with excellent knowledge of products. Prices are legit and not ridiculous. The store is clean allowing you to enjoy the large selection of a vast range of "tobacco," also carrying neighborhood favorites of beer.

text.text: Great service, with excellent knowledge of products. Prices are legit and not ridiculous. The store is clean allowing you to enjoy the large selection of a vast range of "tobacco," also carrying neighborhood favorites of beer.

originalText.text:
HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND INFLATED PRICES! I never review but feel this place is so bad it is my duty to let you know.

Over the last 2 months, I've spent $300+ at this store. WHY? While the PRICES ARE VERY HIGH, it is on my way home and was convenient.

My first purchase was an e-cigerette vaporizer pen called the "ego one vape pen" for $89 (retails for $39 online). I also bought $20 of e-juice. During this purchase, I was told not to buy the discount pens because if they don't work I can't return it. Ok, I'll take your word. AND, if I have a problem in the future, I anticipate them honoring their word.

A week later, I came back and bought a Grenco MicroG 2.0 Vaporizer pen for $79 (retails online for $54).

The following week, I bought the Smokly eBlack 650mah for $39 (retails online for $29). This worked great for a week and then I lost it.

I went back 2 weeks ago and bought another Smokly eBlack 650mah as a replacement for another $39 (again retails online for $29). I also bought some other over-priced accessories for another $40.

This last purchase--the Smokly eBlack 650mah--was clearly defective. It only holds a charge for 10 minutes (a 650mah battery should last at least 4-6 hours). OK, I thought. I will go back to the store and ask them to honor their word that they stand behind their full priced vape pens. I've been out of town on business and haven't been able to return it.

Today, 14-days later, I went back to simply exchange the clearly DEFECTIVE unit. They first tried to blame the issue on me. After another customer confirmed he has had the same issue with the same product, they then said they only accept returns after 7-days. WHAT? They then were very rude and insisted nothing could be done... Great way to run a business.

In all, I calculate I've spent $310 in 2 months. I should have bought everything online and saved $115. YES, they markup their products on average 30%. And, despite all my business, they wouldn't replace a battery that likely costs them less than $10.

BEWARE: DO NOT SHOP HERE!!!

originalText.text: I got an Airbox today that was supposed to last me for 5 days (with 5000 puffs). Turned out it is some knock-off version that finished mid-day. Will not be buying anything from here again.

originalText.text: This big vape shop and they have everything i must say and stuff here are kind and helpful. I come here all the time get my beers ,vaporizers and so on. I will  recommended  100% to check out this vape shop.
